page.title: 01BLOCK PREFACE (1)
page.content:
If the 12 square block were treated as one square, the major land cover would be {Farmland.
The major and indeed only industry is farming. This farming is mainly the growing of{cereal crops}then sheep farming followed by dairy farming.
Even allowing for crop rotation it is unlikely that it would be any different. Notably absent among crops are fruit trees and hops.
The block contains two{recreation areas both wooded, one known as{The {Warren}and the other, looked after by the{Nature Conservancy Trust,}known as {Hothfield Common,}a popular picnic spot.
{More about the block on page two.
